body.p: In this chapter we'll deal with handling multiple representations of the same ressource. The same list of posts or comments could be available as HTML, as a printable HTML version, as a whitelabel snippet for inclusion in other websites or as an rss feed. It would be annoying if we had to duplicate the application logic to handle this, so the framework offers a facility to deal with this exact problem. It's called "output types".
The result of this chapter can be downloaded at http://www.agavi.org/guide/stages/stage6.tgz
